attributes.action: Charge a more reasonable ammount for telephone charges for passport enquiries
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If you telephone the passport agency to make an enquiry, you are charged at the rate of £1.50 per minute. The menus are organised such that the minimum ammount of time you are on line is at least 3 minutes.
The government are no better than some of the commercial game shows that operate similar scams
